attributes.action: MAKE IT ILLEGAL for the FCO to spend any money on british citizen jihadists who are killed in middle eastern war zones.
attributes.additional_details:
What we want you to do us in upper case lettering above - you seem unable to identify what is wanted of you, on so many occasions!

UK taxpayer pounds MUST not be expended as the result of the death of british jihadists in foreign countries which are war zones.  Muslims, and others, who choose to travel to join in the fighting do so entirely of their own choice AND THEY HAVE EVERY RIGHT TO MAKE THAT CHOICE.  It is NOT right, however, that we UK taxpayers should not be forced to fund any FCO activity arising from that death. If the family want to know the circumstances then they should be invited to pay for it UP FRONT AND BEFORE ANY ACTION BY THE FCO.
